modShortDescription: Take a grenade, raw meat, and tape it all together. Pull the pin and watch them run to it and KABOOM.
modDescription:
Take a [grenade](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-ammo/), raw meat, and tape it all together. Pull the pin and watch them run to it and KABOOM.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/DayhawkSilverstar/7DaysToDieMods/tree/master/Dayhawks%20Lure%20Grenades)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/21381-a19-dayhawks-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Dayhawk](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/dayhawk/)
